item.description:
Please note the new location! This month we're trying something different! Two events in one!

If you've been wanting to make conservative friends and/or get more involved, this is a perfect opportunity to do either or both!

The March Meetup will take place at Lir on Boylston St to allow meetup members to attend our monthly event and also take advantage of the opportunity to meet MA candidates at a Friend Raiser upstairs.

Join us for the meetup, for the candidate event, or BOTH!

Please read below for more info.


* - * - * FIRST FLOOR, BACK OF BAR * - * - *
- * - * BOSTON REPUBLICAN MEETUP * - * -

Boston Republican Monthly Meetup, 6:00 - 8:30 PM

* Want to vent about Obama or Deval Patrick, or speculate about 2010 elections with someone who may actually share your viewpoint?

* Don't really care much about politics, but just looking to hang out with local conservatives?

The monthly meetup is a casual gathering to give us lonely MA Republicans an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees, men and women of all ages!

Come whenever you can for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. As always, there's NO AGENDA, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...


- * - * - * - * UPSTAIRS * - * - * - * -
* - * CANDIDATE FRIEND RAISER * - *

Boston and Statewide Candidate Friend Raiser, 6:00 - 8:00 PM
"Because we're all in this together"

From the event description:
Come meet GOP candidates from Boston and across the state. Learn about their campaigns and how you can help make this the best year for Republicans in twenty years.

Hosted by Brad Marston, GBYR, MAYR, and Boston Ward 5 Republican Committee.

A free event.

Learn more here about the Candidate Friend Raiser here:
http://www.facebook.c...


* * * PARKING TIPS * * *

Your most economical option will be to luck out with street parking (meters run till 8PM).
There is a $10 lot just across Mass Ave.
Try this website for parking options.
http://boston.bestpar...


* * * * * * * * * *

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 30-40 attendees every time!


Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and on Facebook.
item.name: Republican March Meetup & Candidate Event @ Lir
